I played this game on my friends iPad and I loved it. The concept is amazing and the detail they put into it is great. But I wouldn‚Äôt say that the 2 dollars if worth it. I say this because I finished the entire game in a week and now it just feels like I wasted my money on this game. I haven‚Äôt heard of any new update to this game in a long time. If you have a lot of money I recommend you get this game. It has super fun mechanics and it‚Äôs a fun game to play when your bored. Just noted that you may finish the game quickly if you have experience with other runner games.

I first played this game about 2-3 years ago, and had a lot of fun. The only problem was that my iPhone 4 (what I had at the time) couldn‚Äôt delete apps, so when I downloaded this game, that fault caused so much lag I couldn‚Äôt play the game without my phone getting both very hot and very prone to crashing apps when I opened them. However, I was able to play up to the 9th-ish level before lag forced me to stop. All in all, one of the best games of this type I‚Äôve played. Just make sure your phone can handle it first.
